A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw The last jedi with 2 other people\, all Stars Wars fans\, WE ALL Hated it. The movie NEVER develops characters like Snoke or Capt Phasma before they are quickly disposed of! The hour and half \"O.J.\" slow chase was RIDICULOUS!!! and anyone who tries to defend that is trying too hard!! We wanted to leave about half thru\, but stuck it out in hopes that it would end well\,....it didn't ! Luke was wasted\,.....before being disposed of and the rebels were so incompetent that you were happy that there were only a handful left alive at the end!!
